AuthenticatorAssertionResponseAuthentica.summary: The authenticatorData property of the interface returns an {{jsxref("ArrayBuffer")}} containing information from the authenticator such as the Relying Party ID Hash (rpIdHash), a signature counter, test of user presence, user verification flags, and any extensions processed by the authenticator.
AuthenticatorAssertionResponseAuthentica.value: An with a of at least 37 bytes, which contains the data structure explained in Authenticator data.
